author: Laura Osman
title: Federal government urges med students, retirees to volunteer in the fight against COVID-19
description: The federal government is seeking volunteers with medical experience to provide backup support in the fight against COVID-19.
content:
The federal government is seeking volunteers with medical experience to provide backup support in the fight against COVID-19.
